Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.alexkasko.krakatau</groupId>
  <artifactId>krakatau-maven-plugin</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.1</version>
  <type>maven-plugin</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.alexkasko.krakatau:krakatau-maven-plugin:maven-plugin:1.0.1'

Apache Ant

<dependency org="com.alexkasko.krakatau" name="krakatau-maven-plugin" rev="1.0.1">
  <artifact name="krakatau-maven-plugin" type="maven-plugin" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.alexkasko.krakatau', module='krakatau-maven-plugin', version='1.0.1')
)

Grails

compile 'com.alexkasko.krakatau:krakatau-maven-plugin:1.0.1'

Leiningen

[com.alexkasko.krakatau/krakatau-maven-plugin "1.0.1"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.alexkasko.krakatau" %% "krakatau-maven-plugin" % "1.0.1"
